sentences.en: But I'll own up fairly , I've the shakes upon me for the gallows.
sentences.cn: 不过我对你说实话, 我一想起绞架就忍不住要发抖.

sentences.en: He was saved from the gallows by a lastminute reprieve.
sentences.cn: 最后一刻的缓刑令把他从绞架上解救了下来.

sentences.en: Here's Johnny Gloke, the great gaintkiller, come with a gallows to hang us all!
sentences.cn: 降妖伏魔的那个约翰尼·格洛克来啦, 他带着绞架来要把我们通通绞死.

sentences.en: It is not much worse than the gallows.
Now I was to expiate all my offences at the gallows.
sentences.cn: 现在我将在绞刑架上赎我一切的罪过.

sentences.en: On the top of the gallows is fixed the knife.
Richard Crowninshield thought he would avoid the gallows—and might well have—had Joe Knapp not confessed his role in the plot to the Rev. Colman.
sentences.cn: 理查德·克劳宁希尔德以为自己能逃脱绞刑——事实也的确如此，因为乔·克纳普不承认他先前对科尔曼神父的供词。

sentences.en: The criminal ended up in the gallows.
sentences.cn: 那个罪犯最后被绞死了.

sentences.en: The judge condemned the criminal to the gallows.
sentences.cn: 法官判了这名罪犯绞刑.

sentences.en: The judge sentenced the murderer to the gallows.
sentences.cn: 法官判杀人犯处以绞刑.

sentences.en: The murderer was executed on the gallows.
The murderer was sent to the gallows for his crimes.
sentences.cn: 谋杀犯由于罪大恶极被处以绞刑.

sentences.en: There's a thief hanging on the gallows out there, and I'll cut his hand off; which hand was it?
sentences.cn: 我想办法帮你渡过难关.外面绞刑架上吊着一个小偷.我去把他的手切下来.哪只手呢?""

sentences.en: You'd better watch your step, young man, or you'll end up on the gallows.
sentences.cn: 你最好小心点儿, 小伙子, 要不然你会死在绞刑架上的.

phrases.tran_cn: 充满怨恨的幽默；化解严重场面或僵局的幽默（等于gallows humour）

trans.tran_en: a structure used for killing criminals by hanging from a rope
